titles.title: A resolution commending G. Russell Walker on the occasion of his retirement.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/26/1988--Introduced. Expresses the Senate's appreciation and gratitude to G. Russell Walker on the occasion of his retirement from the position of Editor in Chief of the Congressional Record of the U.S. Senate.
